about_the_game:
The cold wakes you up. The omnipresent dampness feeds on your warmth, slowly robbing you of your senses. Heavy rain and wind are tugging at the thick, dense fog, which seems to become more impenetrable by the moment... You notice a sign on a large wooden board: Welcome to Green Park



Here you will face your greatest fears. Your apparent isolation and loneliness will turn out to be an open door through which not only your demons will haunt you... You will soon realise that you are never alone - there is always SOMEONE watching and listening.
Haunted Memories: The Return is a psychological horror in which you assume the role of yourself. You decide which path you will take and what will happen in Green Park this time. But the question remains - will you ever be able to leave?
Is that even possible?

GAMEPLAY FEATURES

  • Unravel the mystery of Green Park.
  • Collect all the evidence you can - files, voice recordings, videotapes and photographs. Connect the dots and get to the bottom of a mystery that is as frightening as it is real.
  • Use the UV light filter.
  • Find out the big truth about all the places you visit using things that are invisible to the naked eye.
  • Survive the nightmare.
  • The terror will defend its secrets in over ten unique locations. From intimate crime scenes to historical monuments to death, there will be a grain of truth hidden everywhere.
  • Fill in the form carefully...
    ...for it will become your world.
  • Don't get caught...

name: Haunted Memories: The Return

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WIN10-64 bit
  • Processor: Intel I3 7-th generation
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WIN11-64 bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 2700 Eight-Core Processor, 3.20 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2080 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: Haunted Memories: The Return is a psychological horror in which you assume the role of yourself. You decide which path you will take and what will happen in Green Park this time. But the question remains - will you ever be able to leave?
